plot: A group of intellectuals holidaying together at an isolated beach become mentally unhinged by the presence of a beautiful English nudist.
title: Ostria - To telos tou paihnidiou
plot_es: A group of intellectuals holidaying together at an isolated beach become mentally unhinged by the presence of a beautiful English nudist.
plot_en: A group of intellectuals holidaying together at an isolated beach become mentally unhinged by the presence of a beautiful English nudist.
